generated_changelog:
## What's Changed
- GPU Standalone CI: Build and test event display and other components without ROOT/VC/FMT/ONNX by @David Rohr
- DPL: Improve rate limiting and debugging by @Giulio Eulisse
- GPU QA: Add Correctly Attached non-fake normalized cluster count by @David Rohr
- Fix 1/3 SM numbers and add class for EMCal temperature calibration by @Joshua Koenig
- Update CODEOWNERS file by @Sandro Wenzel
- Fix running TPC at P2 online without GPUs by @davidrohr
- Simplify builder holders and improve filling kernel speed by @ktf and @Christian Sonnabend
- Add support for bitmap in ROFRecords by @mcoquet642
